# Core Rule 2 - Do not be toxic It may be impossible to avoid looking like a dick when completing objectives, forgetting department jobs, and surviving disasters. However, you must not actively contribute to toxicity beyond roleplay. (Sources of toxicity include spam, provocation, aggression, and disproportionate reactions.)
## Examples [color=#994444]Prohibited:[/color] - Repeating messages for attention - Arguing over balance upon dying - Targeting characters and players over multiple lives - Threatening to ahelp
